domain.location

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.location.Location

  • public final class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class representing a location on an IBoard with a given BoardSize, specified by a given row and column index.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location(int index, IBoardSize size)
      Creates a new Location with the given parameters.
      Location(int row, int col, IBoardSize size)
      Creates a new Location with the given parameters.
      Location(Location location)
      Creates a new Location equal to the one given, but without any links between the two.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Location

        public Location(int row,
                int col,
                IBoardSize size)
         throws LocationOutOfRangeException
        Creates a new Location with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        row - The row on the IBoard.
        col - The column on the IBoard.
        size - The size of the IBoard.
        Throws:
        LocationOutOfRangeException - When the given row and/or column is outside the given IBoardSize.

      • Location

        public Location(int index,
                IBoardSize size)
         throws LocationOutOfRangeException
        Creates a new Location with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        index - The position of this location based on the index number of the corresponding SquareBlack. Numbering starts at 1 in the upper leftmost black square and ends in the lower rightmost black square.
        size - The size of the IBoard.
        Throws:
        LocationOutOfRangeException - When the given index is invalid on the given IBoardSize.

      • Location

        public Location(Location location)
        Creates a new Location equal to the one given, but without any links between the two.
        Parameters:
        location - The Location to clone.

        public boolean isOnPromotionRow(Player player)
        Returns true if this Location lies on the promotion row of the given Player, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player whose promotion row to check.

      • isAbove

        public boolean isAbove(Location other)
        Returns true if this Location lies above (i.e. North) of the other Location, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Location to compare with.

      • isBelow

        public boolean isBelow(Location other)
        Returns true if this Location lies below (i.e. South) of the other Location, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Location to compare with.

      • isLeftFrom

        public boolean isLeftFrom(Location other)
        Returns true if this Location lies left (i.e. West) of the other Location, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Location to compare with.

      • isRightFrom

        public boolean isRightFrom(Location other)
        Returns true if this Location lies right (i.e. East) of the other Location, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Location to compare with.

      • isInFront

        public boolean isInFront(Location other,
                         Player player)
        Returns true if this Location lies in front of the other Location from the perspective of the given Player, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Location to compare with.
        player - The Player whose perspective to consider.

        player - The Player whose perspective to consider.

      • getAbove

        public Location getAbove()
                  throws LocationOutOfRangeException
        Returns the Location one row above this one.
        Throws:
        LocationOutOfRangeException - When a location index cannot be converted to a Location considering the IBoardSize.
